thread.title: BRIEF-Xiamen Meiya Pico Information to acquire stakes in two firms for 807 mln yuan
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Xiamen Meiya Pico Information to acquire stakes in two firms for 807 mln yuan | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Xiamen Meiya Pico Information to acquire stakes in two firms for 807 mln yuan
text:
Oct 14 Xiamen Meiya Pico Information Co Ltd
* Says plans to acquire stakes in two firms for a combined 807.3 million yuan ($127.21 million) via share issue
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1Ncv4EH
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3462 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
